# Test Memo

This is a test.

```ruby
class Ruby
  def initialize
    @ruby = 'Ruby'
  end
  def hello
    puts "Hello, #{@ruby}."
  end
end
```

```java
public static class Main {
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    System.out.println("Hello, Java");
  }
}
```
